scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:resources && npm run build:tgz
scripts.copy:resources: npm run copy:local && npm run update:local && npm run copy:bkg && npm run copy:popup && npm run copy:admin && npm run copy:scenarios
scripts.copy:local: shx mkdir dist && shx cp -R src/resources/* dist/
scripts.copy:bkg: shx mkdir dist/background && shx cp -R ../../node_modules/get-set-fetch-extension-background/dist/* dist/background
scripts.copy:popup: shx mkdir dist/popup && shx cp -R ../../node_modules/get-set-fetch-extension-popup/dist/* dist/popup
scripts.copy:admin: shx mkdir dist/admin && shx cp -R ../../node_modules/get-set-fetch-extension-admin/dist/* dist/admin
scripts.copy:scenario-extract-resource: npm run copy:scenario-extract-resource-dist && npm run copy:scenario-extract-resource-pkg
scripts.copy:scenario-scrape-static-content: npm run copy:scenario-scrape-static-content-dist && npm run copy:scenario-scrape-static-content-pkg
scripts.copy:scenario-scrape-dynamic-content: npm run copy:scenario-scrape-dynamic-content-dist && npm run copy:scenario-scrape-dynamic-content-pkg
scripts.copy:scenarios: npm run copy:scenario-scrape-static-content && npm run copy:scenario-scrape-dynamic-content
